thread.title: Oscar Isaac Expecting First Child With Girlfriend Elvira Lind
thread.title_full: Oscar Isaac Expecting First Child With Girlfriend Elvira Lind

author: Antoinette Bueno
title: Oscar Isaac Expecting First Child With Girlfriend Elvira Lind
text: Oscar Isaac Expecting First Child With Girlfriend Elvira Lind by Antoinette Bueno 1:27 PM PDT, March 28, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Congratulations are in order for actor Oscar Isaac and his girlfriend, Danish director Elvira Lind! The couple was snapped heading to dinner in New York City on Monday, where Lind's baby bump was undeniable in a green maxi dress. Lind's pregnancy marks the first child for both. Photo: FAMEFLYNET PICTURES NEWS: Oscar Isaac Talks Growing Beards, Dancing & Lying to the Press About 'Star Wars' The 38-year-old Star Wars: The Force Awakens actor is currently in NYC to shoot his new movie, Life Itself , with Olivia Wilde. The film, which centers on the lives of people from New York to Spain that intersect over the course of different generations, doesn't hit theaters until 2018. NEWS: Oscar Isaac Talks 'Star Wars' Sequels: 'We're Making S**t Up as We Go' ET spoke with Isaac last May, when he talked about the Star Wars franchise's feverishly anticipated Episode VIII. "The new additions to the cast, like Laura Dern and Benicio Del Toro, they're incredible actors and Rian [Johnson, Episode VIII 's director], his sensibility is one of smaller films," he told ET. "So, within all of the bigness and the epic scope of the film, it does feel like we're getting to find some of that nuance and that intimacy." "Poe, he gets to be more a part of the story, and all of the characters in the film, they get tested, intensely," he added. "It's a lot of conflict in it, which is great." Watch below:
